commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff* Where could she have gone?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: She's nowhere to be found, zura.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I could've sworn she ran this way.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Do you hear that? It sounds like water.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Water? N-No way!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Wow, a river, zura! The water's so clear and pretty.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You don't think Eli fell in the river, do you?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I wonder. The current's fast, but it doesn't look very deep. Huh?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hey! There she is! By those rocks!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: E-Everyone?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Eli! Oh, I'm so glad you're okay.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Eli, are you all right? Did you see something scary back there, zura?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: N-No. Everything was just really dark and I got scared. Then, all of a sudden, that bush right next to me moved and I totally freaked out and started running.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: That's right, you're scared of the dark, aren't you? I'm sorry, I should have realized.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: No, I'm the one who should be apologizing. I caused you all so much trouble.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Was there actually something inside the bush? I couldn't tell because you were screaming.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, it was just a stray cat. I caught a glimpse of it when it came out. I even got a picture of it. Wanna see?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'm impressed you managed to snap a picture in all that commotion.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: A-A cat?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Good thing it wasn't a bear or a wild dog or something, zura.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Indeed. Well, since we found Eli safe and sound, why don't we all get back on the path?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Which way did we come from again?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Th-That way, I think.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I wasn't paying attention because of all the commotion, zura.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wow. Are we lost?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I-I'm so sorry, everyone!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Don't be upset, Eli. We'll find our way back, I promise.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hey, why don't we rest for a little bit? We all ran pretty hard coming out here. We can find our way back to the path after we catch our breath.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I agree. This is as good a place as any for a short break.
